data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Los Rios.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Los Rios, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Los Rios, Ecuador be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help 155 new simple churches start among the 778,100 people in the state of Los Rios, Ecuador. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, move the 82,258 believers in the state of Los Rios to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people is yours.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Los Rios, Ecuador to the gospel today.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Los Rios, Ecuador into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 778,100 people living in Los Rios, Ecuador. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Los Rios
location.people_groups_list: Media Lengua, Secoya, Taromenane, Tagaeri, Chachi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Media Lengua (3,200), Secoya (500), Taromenane (200), Tagaeri (30), Chachi (11,000)
